command.name: !pcount
command.desc: Displays server player count.

command.name: !uptime
command.desc: Displays server uptime.

command.name: !players
command.desc: Displays a list of all players IG.

command.name: !pm
command.desc: Allows you to PM players who are IG.

command.name: !commands
command.desc: Gives you a list of all commands you can use.

command.name: !cmds
command.desc: Gives you a list of all commands you can use.

command.name: !money
command.desc: Allows you to check how much money a player has.

command.name: !health
command.desc: Allows you to check how much health a player has.

command.name: !wantedlevel
command.desc: Allows you to check how much WL a player has.

command.name: !team
command.desc: Allows you to check what team a player is in.

command.name: !ping
command.desc: Allows you to check what ping a player has.

command.name: !map
command.desc: Displays the map the server is running.

command.name: !server
command.desc: Displays the server name and port.

command.name: !zone
command.desc: Allows you to check the location of a player.

command.name: !sup
command.desc: Allows you to talk in the IG Support Chat from IRC.

command.name: !support
command.desc: Allows you to talk in the IG Support Chat from IRC.

command.name: !say
command.desc: Allows you to talk IG from IRC [Main Chat].

command.name: !s
command.desc: Allows you to talk IG from IRC [Main Chat].

command.name: !m
command.desc: Allows you to talk IG from IRC [Main Chat].

command.name: !ts
command.desc: Allows you to talk IG from IRC [Team Chat].

command.name: !kick
command.desc: Allows you to kick a player.

command.name: !note
command.desc: Allows you to say a note IG.

command.name: !getip
command.desc: Allows you to get the IP of a player.

command.name: !getserial
command.desc: Allows you to get the Serial of a player.

command.name: !mute
command.desc: Allows you to mute a player.

command.name: !unmute
command.desc: Allows you to unmute a player.

command.name: !mutes
command.desc: Allows you to check all mutes.

command.name: !freeze
command.desc: Allows you to freeze a player.

command.name: !unfreeze
command.desc: Allows you to unfreeze a player.

command.name: !kill
command.desc: Allows you to kill a player.

command.name: !slap
command.desc: Allows you to slap a player.

command.name: !country
command.desc: Allows you to check what country a player is from.

command.name: !ircSay
command.desc: Allows you to talk in channels as Kayla.

command.name: !lua
command.desc: Allows you to run functions.

command.name: !run
command.desc: Allows you to run functions [Server Side].

command.name: !crun
command.desc: Allows you to run functions [Client Side].

command.name: !account
command.desc: Allows you to get a players account name.

command.name: !join
command.desc: Allows you to make the bot join a channel.

command.name: !leave
command.desc: Allows you to make the bot leave a channel.

command.name: !usage
command.desc: Allows you to view resource usage

command.name: !status
command.desc: Allows you to stop a resource.

command.name: !imute
command.desc: Displays server player count.

command.name: !ban
command.desc: Allows you to ban a player.

command.name: !banip
command.desc: Allows you to ban player by IP.

command.name: !banserial
command.desc: Allows you to ban a player by Serial.

command.name: !banname
command.desc: Allows you to ban a player by Name.

command.name: !unbanip
command.desc: Allows you to unban a IP.

command.name: !unbanserial
command.desc: Allows you to unban a Serial

command.name: !unban
command.desc: Allows you to unban a entity.

command.name: !bans
command.desc: Displays a list of all bans.

command.name: !refresh
command.desc: Allows you to refresh the server for resources.

command.name: !resources
command.desc: Displays a list of all resources.

command.name: !start
command.desc: Allows you to start a resource.

command.name: !restart
command.desc: Allows you to restart a resource.

command.name: !stop
command.desc: Allows you to stop a resource.

command.name: !modules
command.desc: Allows you to check all the modules that are running.

command.name: !newcmds
command.desc: Displays a list of all commands with a description.

command.name: !restartme
command.desc: Allows you to restart the IRC bot.

command.name: !shutdown
command.desc: Allows you to shut down the server.

command.name: !password
command.desc: Allows you to view or set the server password.

command.name: !refreshall
command.desc: Allows you to refresh all things inside the server.

command.name: !checkmap
command.desc: Allows you to check a map files.

command.name: !changemap
command.desc: Allows you to change the server map.

command.name: !gravity
command.desc: Allows you to modify the gravity inside the server.

command.name: !weather
command.desc: Allows you to view the current weather or change the weather.

command.name: !refundplayer
command.desc: Allows you to refund a player.
